desc: Elm City Botanicals is a one-woman shop that specializes in natural handmade soaps, candles, and massage oil candles. Every item is handmade in small batches with the highest quality ingredients in the Elm City - aka New Haven, CT.

layout.text: Treat yourself to a fresh, more natural experience
Elm City Botanicals is a small business that specializes in handmade and small batch luxury candles, soaps, and massage oil candles.
